name: Last Spotlight
description:
Last Spotlight

I've been going out for late night walks recently.

A short game-poem made in Bitsy, in which a musician steps out after dark and has thoughts about personas, digital ghosts, and an artist's worth. Inspired by the lingering echo of artists who have removed themselves from the internet, like Mitski.

Click in window and use arrow/WASD keys on computer, or swipe on a touchscreen.

Created 9/09/21 for Carnegie Mellon University's Experimental Game Studio.

Find Bitsy here: https://ledoux.itch.io/bitsy
